contents: 2. fol. 25a-31a: Istiqṣāʼ al-naẓar fī al-qaḍāʼ wa-al-qadar.
4. fol. 39b-44a: [Risālah fī sharḥ suʼāl Kumayl ibn Ziyād "mā al-ḥaqīqah?"].
5. fol. 46b-47b: [Jawāb suʼāl ʻammā rawāhu al-Ṣadūq fī al-Faqīh].
8. fol. 56b-87a: Ḥayāt al-nafs fī ḥadrat al-quds.
11. fol. 110a-111b: Taḥqīq fī ithbāt waḥdat al-wujūd / Muḥammad Ṣādiq Irjānī [?]. Dated 127-; in Persian.
14. fol. 116b-119b: [Persian commentary on a hadith from al-Kāfī].
15. fol. 120b-170b: Dar masāʼil-i ḥikmah-i ṭabīʻī. Dated 1193 H.
17. fol. 183b-203b: Ghāyat al-imkān fī dirāyat al-zamān wa-al-makān / fī afkār ʻAyn al-Quḍāh al-Hamadānī.
extent: 203 leaves : paper ; 153 x 109 mm. bound to 160 x 114 mm.
